name: .SEAM File Extension
summary: Learn about .SEAM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Java Web applications supported by the JBoss Seam Framework; stores a reference to a backend servlet, which processes requests to the Web application; used for serving pages to the user through a Web browser; often used with the JavaServer Facelets technology.

content: While the ".seam" extension is seen in Web browser URLs, it generally does not refer to an actual file on the file system. Instead, it usually is a placeholder for mapping URLs to backend servlets. The web.xml file of a Java Web application usually contains this mapping rule:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
